The word لَا comes from the root ل ا and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: to will/wish. shaiun (pl. ashyaa'un) - thing/matter, affair in any way, at all, what is willed or wished, aught, any extent. In direct objective case it is often used to denote the meaning "a little", "bit", "at all". Adverbially it means "in any way", "at all".
data.sentence: The word شَيْئًا comes from the root ش ي ا and is associated with the meanings: to will/wish. shaiun (pl. ashyaa'un) - thing/matter, affair in any way, at all, what is willed or wished, aught, any extent. In direct objective case it is often used to denote the meaning "a little", "bit", "at all". Adverbially it means "in any way", "at all".
The word يُنْصَرُونَ comes from the root ن ص ر and is associated with the meanings: to assist/aid, succour, protect.

data.meanings: day, era, time, today, this/that day, age/period of time.
data.sentence: The word يَوْمَ comes from the root ي و م and is associated with the meanings: day, era, time, today, this/that day, age/period of time.
The word عَنْهُمْ comes from the root ع ن and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Dal) To be about to, be just on the point of, be well nigh, intend, wish.
data.sentence: The word كَيْدُهُمْ comes from the root ك ي د and is associated with the meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Dal) To be about to, be just on the point of, be well nigh, intend, wish.

data.meanings: free from wants, having no wants, in a state of competence or sufficiency or rich or wealthy; dwelt, abode; sing, chanted; eulogized, satirized
data.sentence: The word يُغْنِي comes from the root غ ن ي and is associated with the meanings: free from wants, having no wants, in a state of competence or sufficiency or rich or wealthy; dwelt, abode; sing, chanted; eulogized, satirized
